metadata.name: BattleMancers Genesis #1
metadata.description: BattleMancers Genesis is a collection consisting of 6 different races; Humans, Orcs, Elves, Demons, Dragonkin and Death Knight. The collection aims to find utility in an exclusive P2E ecosystem that will unite web 2 and web 3 players. The first game launching for the collection is also called BattleMancers, a multiplayer tower defense game built in unity and integrated to blockchain via Ethereum Network.
